channel.title: Need some help deciding
channel.description:
Guys, as you all know my motorbike was stolen, etc.
Anyway, I need to decide what to do with my future. I was going extremely well with my racing career, and there was a chance I would turn pro. but it costs so fucking much to continue with it. I am only half way through Juniors and it has sent my family broke, but, I am not going to do the whole "waa waa" thing as I have done it enough in real life. I have spent the past 5 months feeling sorry for myself.
Lately I have been going extremely well in kickboxing, and it is a lot cheaper, fucking 1000000 times less dangerous, and there's a high chance I will turn pro. if I keep it up (I don't like to over-talk myself, but my trainer said that).
So I need to decide whether or not to continue racing, or kick my way into the history books.

item.title: Need some help deciding
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“moparscape4lifez, post:85, topic:231573”]Moparscapeian? or however you call it he is a moderator there… he spends time moderating moparscape how could he possibly have the endurance to someone he is describing MAYBE for summer fun… but on TV for doing stunts rofl? yup and i’m tony hawk in disguise.

P.S. Yay im Senior member![/quote]

I read your topic about your bike being
Stolen a while back,And felt extremely sorry.

Being honest I know its more money down the drain,
And a big risk but I think you should do racing,
I’d say if you did become “pro” you will
Start making a profit, although its a big risk.

Two words for moparscape4lifez:
Fuck off.

item.title: Need some help deciding
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“maniown, post:95, topic:231573”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=305014.msg2451079#msg2451079 date=1221967455]

Fine we can suit you up and let you get leveled by bob sanders

Hey dick head. Go race on a pro track some time. I would like to see you man up and jump a 130 foot uphill.

They don’t jump a 130 foot hill lol…

Yes they do, look at Laracco’s leap at Red Bud.

look up larracos leap on youtube. jumped it on my 250…

What the fuck? I would never hit that haha.
[/quote] i didnt hit it in a race. Haha. I hit it in my 3rd practice during a week long redbud trip. They made it 20 feet shorter… dunno why

Still, that’s fucking insane, apparently you can see for miles when you’re up there.

Can you people shut the fuck about fast-food and fucking help Yz85Racer.

@Yz: I had a shitton of choice like these in my life. It really is up to you; what do you enjoy more, what gives you more of a thrill, motocross, or muay thai?

Thanks io9, Motocross definitely is a lot more of a thrill, a fucking lot more. The whole sport is 100% adrenaline, but money is my problem.

Well. I was scared like no other… and i kinda just came off hot break tapped in and then it took FOREVER before i hit the ground.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2008, 01:55:47 pm[/size][hr][quote author=moparscape4lifez link=topic=305014.msg2451328#msg2451328 date=1221976255]
two say so I got moparscape in my name… honestly I don’t care about names.

85 in your name means? your birth? 1985? wow your old… :rolleyes:
[/quote]

He races an 85cc bike… you no brained fuck head.[/quote]
inb4someone says “raced*”.

@Greeny wrote:

moparscape4lifez:

P.S. Yay im Senior member!

You just lost all rights to speak.

Yz can aspire to whatever the fuck he wants, that’s what seperates winners from losers. If you’re happy being a little fuckwit in a dead-end job, be my guest. However, some of us have ambition, blowing people down is the wrong attitude to take, trying to spoil someone’s aspirates is personally, what I believe to be one of the cruellest and least thoughtful things someone can do.

In conclusion: wanker.

item.title: Need some help deciding
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

moparscape4lifez:

Moparscapeian? or however you call it he is a moderator there… he spends time moderating moparscape how could he possibly have the endurance to someone he is describing MAYBE for summer fun… but on TV for doing stunts rofl? yup and i’m tony hawk in disguise.

I don’t think I do stunts, not sure where you are but every year when I have rode in Australian Titles the results are published and it is filmed, they make you sign a contract when you apply for your national license. I believe Jorsa can vouch for this, as he has seen the Australian Titles on the T.V.

I may be a MoparScape moderator, I may go to moparscape only to moderate. I don’t see how it makes me a moparscaper, after all, you’re lame enough to have moparscape in your name. If you’re going to insult me, you should probably do it with a little thought rather than bashing random keys on the keyboard.

Read full topic
